sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Debate Transcript Act.

sections.heading: Each house of the General Assembly shall keep a transcript of its
The Clerk of the House of Representatives and the Secretary of the
sections.text:
Senate shall file the transcripts of debates in their respective houses
with the Secretary of State who shall maintain them as a public record and
make them available for public inspection as provided in "The State Records
Act", approved July 6, 1957, as amended.
